"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.text19","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text19 text-center d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"SURFING"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.text16","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text16","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Goa makes it as one of the perfect surfing destination to learn surfing as the Arabian sea is very calm and produces gentle waves, making it perfect for beginners that want to learn surfing. The best time to surf in Goa is from mid September until May. For more consistent swell for intermediate and advance surfers. September, October(Post monsoon swell) and May, June(Pre monsoon swell) works the best."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.layoutGrid4$row1$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.container13","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container13","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.text17","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text17 text-center d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"HOW ABOUT TO GO"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.text18","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text18 text-center d-block","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"UNDERWATER"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.text20","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text20","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The rise of Scuba Diving in Goa is both refreshing and welcome; India’s vast coastlines and tropical waters make it the ideal destination for exploring the underwaters. Where water sports in Goa has always been a preferred tourist activity, North Goa Water Sports has gone a few steps further and made affordable Scuba Diving possible. Explore the colourful and tranquil waters of both Goa, Malvan and Tarkali Beach as you dive to its depths and see our shorelines from a different perspective."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"80.Lets_Travel.FrontPage.staticImage6","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage6","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Lets_Travel$Images$WATER.png?638036877256832769"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
